Red Cross blocked from prison where Ukrainian POWS died   KYIV, Ukraine — Ukrainian and Russian officials blamed each other Saturday for the deaths of dozens of Ukrainian prisoners of war in an attack on a prison in a separatist-controlled area. The International Red Cross asked to visit the prison to make sure the scores of wounded had proper treatment, but said their request was refused.

SUNshine Girl Chantelle   SUNshine Girl Chantelle is a model and bartender. The 5-foot-5, blue-eyed Sagittarius first posed for us in November 2019. (Toronto Sun)

SUNshine Girl Lex   SUNshine Girl Lex is a maternal health worker who loves watching football. The 5-foot-5, hazel-eyed Virgo, who first posed for us in September 2019, dreams of climbing behind the wheel of a Range Rover. (Stan Behal/Toronto Sun)
SUNshine Girl Sonia   SUNshine Girl Sonia loves to blog, read and go hiking. The 5-foot, hazel-eyed Aries, who first posed for us in October 2019, also enjoys tennis. (Ernest Doroszuk/Toronto Sun)
SUNshine Girl Rachel   SUNshine Girl Rachel likes hockey, soccer, and relaxing with a good book. This Scorpio, who first posed for us in March 2020, dreams of becoming a teacher. (Toronto Sun)

SUNshine Girl Alyssa   SUNshine Girl Alyssa loves reading comics and spending time with family. The 5-foot, brown-eyed Leo, who first posed for us in August 2019, also loves tennis, and dreams of climbing behind the wheel of a Lamborghini. (Ernest Doroszuk/Toronto Sun)
